title: Financial Analyst at Cameron Craig Group (Cleveland, OH)
text: Source: Glassdoor Position SummaryThe Financial Analyst is a key member of the Financial Planning & Analysis Group and will be responsible for preparing and analyzing information for the Board of Director's Books, Executive Committee Meeting Books, Budgets and Strategic Plan (SPLAN) updates and other ad hoc requests as required. Financial Analysts are responsible for working with the Financial Planning & Analysis team and other individuals in their assigned Strategic Business Unit (SBU) for purposes of reporting information in Board and Executive Committee Meeting books and other ad hoc requests from Senior/Executive Management. Financial Analysts must have excellent oral and written communication skills as responsibilities include communication within and outside of department and ability to work in fast paced environment as much of the information prepared is time-sensitive. Education A bachelor's degree in Accounting related discipline from an accredited college or university is required. CPA or candidate preferred.ExperienceIn addition to the education listed above, at least 2-3 years experience in public accounting is required. Real estate accounting experience is a plus. Other Skills• Excellent written and verbal communication skills• Team oriented and highly motivated• Thrives on working in a fast-paced environment• Critical thinking• Ability to manage time and multiple tasks to meet deadlines • Basic knowledge of accounting software systems and SAP technologies• Advanced analytical background with detail oriented mindset• Work independently and complete work with minimal guidance and/or supervision • Basic ability to perform quality assurance reviews of own work (self review)• Proficient skills in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
